sentences.sContent: Jimmy turned maudlin after three drinks.
sentences.sCn: 三杯酒下肚后，吉米伤感起来。

synos.tran: 感情脆弱的；容易流泪的；酒后伤感的

trans.tranCn: 感情脆弱的；容易流泪的；酒后伤感的
trans.tranOther: If you describe someone as maudlin, you mean that they are being sad and sentimental in a foolish way, perhaps because of drinking alcohol
